title: This is a good Galio Top build atm
body:
http://puu.sh/oMs7q/49ef9bbdc1.jpg

40% CDR, Zhonyas having it helps a lot
Rocket Belt is surprisingly up to expectations 
Durable/bulky

It does lack damage compared to other builds so I would not take this build mid lane. 

Normally I dont advocate for Galio top but the meta is actually starting to, for once, favor him a bit so yeah.


Sorry if I  wrote this oddly, kinda outta it at the moment and almost asleep but yeah

Edit: If  you're a Top lane Teemo and you rush Executioner's Calling into Wit's End go fuck yourself >.>
